#summary Feature of the web application in order of priority.

= Friendly URL's =

  * /Page/Action = /Pages/Page_Action.aspx

= Users and Permissions =

  * Users
  * User Login
  * User Registration
  * User Logout
  * User Permissions

= Project/Software Settings =

  *

  * Add Wikipage
  * Edit Wikipage
  * Delete Wikipage
  * Wiki History

  * Link to Downloads

  * Add Issue
